StiStTrackFilter.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 //StiStTrackFilter.h
00002 //M.L. Miller (Yale Software)
00003 //03/01
00004 
00005 //This file contains functors that are used to filter StTracks
00006 
00007 struct StiStTrackFilter
00008 {
00009     virtual bool operator()(const StTrack* mytrack) = 0;
00010 };
00011 
00012 //Here's an examle of how to write a filter
00013 struct StiTpcHitStTrackFilter : public StiStTrackFilter
00014 {
00015     virtual bool operator()(const StTrack* mytrack) {
00016         return (mytrack->detectorInfo()->numberOfPoints(kTpcId) > 0);
00017     }
00018 };
